      • build

        public BookDescription build()
        Creates a BookDescription Object, if all mandatory parameters are set.

        Throws an IllegalStateException, indicating which parameter is missing.

        Returns:
        a BookDescription Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when not all mandatory parameters are set
